automation_productivity.reasoning: Agents can chain tools and iterate on observations to automate complex tasks.

beginner_friendly_onboarding.reasoning: Open-source Python package with examples, but requires coding knowledge and model setup.

code_quality_testing.reasoning: Primarily focused on tool use and reasoning rather than software testing workflows.

codebase_comprehension.reasoning: Provides no dedicated code navigation features beyond what custom tools supply.

creative_multimodal_exploration.reasoning: Built-in tools cover web browsing, image generation and speech-to-text for multimodal tasks.

data_experimental_flexibility.reasoning: Supports plugging in custom tools and models from the Hugging Face Hub.

visual_no_code_development.reasoning: Usage is code-driven with no graphical builder.

workflow_agent_orchestration.reasoning: Agent framework enables multi-agent setups and sharing via the Hub but lacks dedicated orchestration UI.
